ch.epfl.scapetoad
Class CartogramNewman

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.scapetoad.CartogramNewman

public class CartogramNewman
extends java.lang.Object

Implementation of the diffusion algorithm of Gastner and Newman. This version is a Java adaptation of Mark Newman's C code.

runningStatusWizard

public CartogramWizard runningStatusWizard
The Cartogram Wizard is used to update the running status. If NULL, no running status update is done.

runningStatusMinimumValue

public int runningStatusMinimumValue
The value of the running status at the begin of the cartogram computation.

runningStatusMaximumValue

public int runningStatusMaximumValue
The value of the running statut at the end of the cartogram computation.

runningStatusMainString

public java.lang.String runningStatusMainString
The main string of the running status which is set by the caller. This string will be displayed in the first line of the running status wizard. The second line is freely used by this class.
